titleStmt.title: A short and priuate discourse betweene Mr. Bolton and one M.S. concerning vsury. Published by E.B. by Mr. Boltons owne coppy
titleStmt.author: Bolton, Robert, 1572-1631.
Bagshaw, Edward, d. 1662.
